body:
I've been having problems building v1.3.0 due to checksum mismatch and I confirm that the checksum in the package oddly no longer matches that calculated by spack.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack checksum py-hatchet@1.3.0
==> Found 1 version of py-hatchet:
  
  1.3.0  https://github.com/hatchet/hatchet/archive/v1.3.0.tar.gz

==> Fetching https://github.com/hatchet/hatchet/archive/v1.3.0.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%

    version('1.3.0', sha256='d77d071fc37863fdc9abc3fd9ea1088904cd98c6980a014a31e44595d2deac5e')
```

BUT the checksum in the package is:

```
    version('1.3.0', sha256='d38212aec6272558e25538ff23b54ec0f2b4dbf6ef4b0e77f7f05c37c0d17815')
```
title: Installation issue: py-hatchet v1.3.0 checksum mismatch
